thread.title: Taylor Swift says pre-Super Bowl show may be her only one in 2017
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift says pre-Super Bowl show may be her only one in 2017

author: USA TODAY Life
title: Taylor Swift says pre-Super Bowl show may be her only one in 2017
text:
Taylor Swift says pre-Super Bowl show may be her only one in 2017 The pop star indicates she doesn't plan to tour this year. Post to Facebook Taylor Swift says pre-Super Bowl show may be her only one in 2017 The pop star indicates she doesn't plan to tour this year.  //usat.ly/2kClLIH   Taylor Swift says pre-Super Bowl show may be her only one in 2017 Lorena Blas , USA TODAY Life 11:43   Taylor Swift onstage at her DIRECTV NOW Super Saturday Night show in Houston. (Photo: Larry Busacca, Getty Images) 
Taylor Swift fans who attended her pre-Super Bowl concert in Houston on Saturday night may have seen her only show of the year. 
The superstar musician announced to the crowd of 9,000 that she has no plans to tour in 2017: "As far as I know I'm only doing one show in 2017, and as far as I know, this is that show. By coming to this show tonight, you are attending 100% of this year’s tour dates.” 
According to the Associated Press, Swift also made some references to football during her 90-minute DIRECTV NOW Super Saturday Night show at Club Nomadic, telling the crowd about her early country-turned-pop hit You Belong With Me , with lyrics about high school cheerleaders, bleachers and boys. She wore a sheer, short Versace dress and bangs. 
Her set included pop smashes such as Shake It Off , Blank Space , Bad Blood , Style , We Are Never Getting Back Together , 22 and I Knew You Were Trouble . 
"It's good to be in Houston, Texas tonight," she told the audience. Facebook
